description:
Emergency Bilge Suction Valves are important ones when it comes to engine room flooding. This course is exclusively developed to target all oral examination questions asked based on Emergency Bilge suction valves. Even though these are spotted everyday by Engineers in ship - most of the engineers feel it to be a grey area and often neglect the importance of it. This course will help them to overcome their fear of operation and maintenance on this valve.

This course is meant to clarify all the doubts which would arise when you prepare for your competency exams.

This course is definitely the need of the hour - helping you save time during your exams.

30 minutes to understand everything about Emergency Bilge Suction valve..! Isn't that awesome?
title: A Complete Guide on - Emergency Bilge Suction Valve
